slides.title: 200 Individual Medley
slides.blurb: Competing in the 200 Individual Medley at the 2018 Section 9 Championship Meet, breaking my own school record from the year before and placing 3rd.

slides.title: Medley Relay
slides.blurb: Leading off the winning medley relay at a dual meet.

slides.title: The Cabin Challenge 2020
slides.blurb: Competing in the Cabin Challenge, a 76 mile bike race with over 5,000 feet of elevation gain.

slides.title: Third Place
slides.blurb: Placing 3rd in the 100 backstroke at the 2019 Section 9 Championship Meet.
